meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels read 02271.1. The rightmost wheel (tenths) shows '1' clearly, with the '2' just beginning to appear at the bottom. The red needle is positioned between the 0.03 and 0.04 marks, visibly closer to 0.04. Visually estimated at 0.039, which rounds to 0.04 for the dial_value as per the 0.01 resolution rule. The corresponding angle for 0.039 on a 0-9 dial (360 degrees / 10 divisions = 36 degrees per unit) is 3.9 * 36 = 140.4 degrees.
